comments.comments_text: Solly March (Brighton) is about to take a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is about to take a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: The referee blows his whistle, Brighton are awarded a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee blows his whistle, [TEAM] are awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Pascal Gross (Brighton) gives the referee no choice but to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gives the referee no choice but to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Kaoru Mitoma (Brighton) finishes his beautiful individual effort with a superb strike from inside the box. Jose Sa is just a bystander as the ball flies into bottom right corner. The score is 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) finishes his beautiful individual effort with a superb strike from inside the box. [PLAYER] is just a bystander as the ball flies into bottom right corner. The score is 0:1.

comments.comments_text: This is a yellow card! Craig Dawson (Wolves) is not happy with the decision, but from our point of view it was clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This is a yellow card! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is not happy with the decision, but from our point of view it was clear.

comments.comments_text: The referee is firm and issues James Milner (Brighton) a deserved yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee is firm and issues [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) a deserved yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Julio Enciso (Brighton) receives a yellow card from the referee as expected.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) receives a yellow card from the referee as expected.

comments.comments_text: Wolves have been awarded a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] have been awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: A corner kick by Brighton is thwarted by the well prepared Jose Sa (Wolves).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A corner kick by [TEAM] is thwarted by the well prepared [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Goal - 0:2! Kaoru Mitoma laid the ball off to Pervis Estupinan (Brighton), who shot from close range into the right side of the goal, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal - 0:2! [PLAYER] laid the ball off to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who shot from close range into the right side of the goal, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

comments.comments_text: Goal - 0:3! Julio Enciso tees up Solly March (Brighton) inside the box and he slams the ball into the roof of the net and past Jose Sa.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal - 0:3! [PLAYER] tees up [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) inside the box and he slams the ball into the roof of the net and past [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: A superb goal from great team play! Solly March (Brighton) latches on to a perfect pass and fires an excellent low shot inside the left post. There is nothing a goalkeeper can do about shots like that.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A superb goal from great team play! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) latches on to a perfect pass and fires an excellent low shot inside the left post. There is nothing a goalkeeper can do about shots like that.

comments.comments_text: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Hee-Chan Hwang (Wolves) comes onto the pitch for Fabio Silva.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) comes onto the pitch for [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Joao Gomes trots off the pitch and is replaced by Pablo Sarabia (Wolves).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and [PLAYER] trots off the pitch and is replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Roberto De Zerbi has decided to make a change. Joao Pedro (Brighton) replaces Danny Welbeck.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] has decided to make a change. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) replaces [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: The game has come to an end for James Milner. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Joel Veltman (Brighton).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The game has come to an end for [PLAYER]. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Wolves force a corner. They send men into the box.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] force a corner. They send men into the box.

comments.comments_text: Pervis Estupinan (Brighton) makes a bad tackle on his opponent and is angry when the referee shows him a deserved yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Pablo Sarabia takes the corner and Hee-Chan Hwang (Wolves) rises highest in the middle of the box to plant a precise header into the bottom right corner. The score is 1:4.

comments.comments_text: Referee Andy Madley points to the centre spot to indicate that the goal stands after the VAR review. The Wolves players celebrate.

comments.comments_text: Adam Webster (Brighton) argues strongly with the referee and is awarded a yellow card. A needless yellow card!
